ðŸ“– Summary: VoidAuth is an open-source single sign-on (SSO) and user management provider designed for self-hosted applications. It offers features like OpenID Connect (OIDC) support, proxy forward authentication, user self-registration, customizable branding, and passkey support, aiming to simplify authentication and user management for self-hosted environments.
